item.title: MIUI 9.3.28 Recovery update for Redmi 4A Global
item.description:
New Weekly Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi 4A Global

Codename: rolex

Version: 9.3.28 | 7.1

Size: 1.7 GB

MD5: 50c20cf60a065dbf1772fccaa02eee27

Changelog:
[App lock]
Fix: Issues with the App lock password form on some devices
[Lockscreen, status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Battery indicator didn't disappear when the Notification shade was opened on the Lock screen
Fix: Issues with displaying notifications on the Lock screen
[Security]
Fix: Virus scan started over after users tapped the results of a completed scan

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
